tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE historical_maps (
    map_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    map_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    map_description TEXT,
    map_date DATE,
    map_image BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE map_layers (
    layer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    layer_name STRING,
    layer_description TEXT,
    map_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (map_id) REFERENCES maps(map_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maps (
    map_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    map_name VARCHAR(255),
    creation_date DATE,
    author VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE map_layers (
    layer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    map_id INT,
    layer_name VARCHAR(255),
    layer_type VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (map_id) REFERENCES maps(map_id)
);

CREATE TABLE map_locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    layer_id INT,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    latitude DECIMAL(9,6),
    longitude DECIMAL(9,6),
    FOREIGN KEY (layer_id) REFERENCES map_layers(layer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE map_layers (
  layer_id VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY,
  layer_name VARCHAR(255),
  layer_type VARCHAR(50),
  map_id VARCHAR(255),
  FOREIGN KEY (map_id) REFERENCES historical_maps(map_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_favorites (
  favorite_id VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY,
  map_id VARCHAR(255),
  user_id VARCHAR(255),
  FOREIGN KEY (map_id) REFERENCES historical_maps(map_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES map_users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE map_layers (
 layer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 map_id INT,
 layer_name VARCHAR(255),
 layer_type VARCHAR(50),
 FOREIGN KEY (map_id) REFERENCES maps(map_id)
 );

CREATE TABLE layer_data (
 data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 layer_id INT,
 data_type VARCHAR(50),
 data_values JSONB,
 FOREIGN KEY (layer_id) REFERENCES map_layers(layer_id)
 );

CREATE TABLE map_locations (
 location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 map_id INT,
 location_name VARCHAR(255),
 latitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
 longitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
 FOREIGN KEY (map_id) REFERENCES maps(map_id)
 );
